Room.Name: Phexton Road/Taragon Road
Room.ShortDescription: This is the intersection of Phexton Road and Taragon Road.
Room.LongDescription: There appears to be a narrow alley tucked in between a brick warehouse and an old theater, long since closed and nailed shut. The alley is on the northwest side of the corner, and apparently runs at an angle for a short ways before making a turn. It's impossible to see very far in the alley. The village wall makes a right angle turn here.
